command.name: add-form
command.title: Add a form to the module
command.help:
This command adds a new form to the given module. The form is intended to be included from another XHTML file by using a <ui:include> directive (it does not contain the <f:view> component). The associated response is a JSON that allows to perform update operations.
web/<module>/<form-name>.xhtml web/<module>/forms/<form-name>-form.xhtml web/<module>/forms/<form-name>-response.xhtml
And the following files are updated to setup the form navigation rules: config/<module>.xml
